root.Summary: 1: Durand J, Huchet V, Merieau E, Usal C, Chesneau M, Remy S, Heslan M, Anegon I,Cuturi MC, Brouard S, Chiffoleau E. Regulatory B Cells with a Partial Defect inCD40 Signaling and Overexpressing Granzyme B Transfer Allograft Tolerance inRodents.
